text: The 1956 Oklahoma A&M; Cowboys football team represented Oklahoma A&M; College in the 1956 NCAA University Division football season. This was the 56th year of football at A&M; and the second under Cliff Speegle. The Cowboys played their home games at Lewis Field in Stillwater, Oklahoma. They finished the season 3–5–2, 2–1–1 in their final season in the Missouri Valley Conference. ==Schedule== ==References== Oklahoma AandM Category:Oklahoma State Cowboys football seasons Oklahoma AM
title: 1956 Oklahoma A&M Cowboys football team
